resources.string: A virus has been spotted in your system. Help your cells defend against this virus by CLICKING your screen whenever the virus is touching one of your cells. Be careful, the vius gets bigger when feeding from one of your cells. If the virus is big enough to enter one of your cells or touch both of them... sorry but you are ill and unable to keep playing. Watch out for the behaviour of the virus!
Warning! You will lose your progress.
Keep playing! What I were thinking?
Your immune system is under attack!
